name: Shifter (TheSticky Studio)
description:
A Two-Dimensional Platformer

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Theme: It is not Real

P.S. This is my very first 3D game :)

Tutorials used: Wallrun Tutorial by Dave / GameDevelopment and Dani's Karlson Movement

Assets used: Customizable Skybox by Key Mouse and Auto Letterbox by Tom Elliot.
